content.taskInstructions:
Instructions


Review tool output for subdomains.

Variation: GetAllURLs


1. Download gau and build with go:
$ git clone https://github.com/lc/gau.git
$ cd gau/cmd
$ go build
$ sudo mv gau /usr/local/bin/

Or install via go:
$ go install github.com/lc/gau/v2/cmd/gau@latest

Or download and run the pre-built binary:
Download appropriate binary from https://github.com/lc/gau/releases/

$ tar xvf gau_<version>_linux_amd64.tar.gz
$ mv gau /usr/bin/gau


2. Run the tool.
gau --subs --threads 20 netspi.com | awk -F/ '{print $3}' | sed -e 's/:.*//' -e 's/^www\.//' | sort -u

Examples:


$ printf example.com | gau
$ cat domains.txt | gau --threads 5
$ gau example.com google.com
$ gau --o example-urls.txt example.com
$ gau --blacklist png,jpg,gif example.com
